string.name: name
string.value: Chief Stan's Piece of Mind of Maple
#bChief Stan#k knows about your quest for the #rMind of Maple#k. He is awaiting your arrival, so go prove your worth to him.

Follow the instructions #bChief Stan#k, and defeat the monsters to gather up the appropriate items and prove him your worth.

#t4032234:##r #c4032234#/20#k
#t4032235:##r #c4032235#/20#k
#t4032236:##r #c4032236#/20#k
#t4032237:##r #c4032237#/20#k
#t4032238:##r #c4032238#/20#k
You have finally received an item of approval from Chief Stan. What does this have to do with restoring #rMind of Maple#k?

Are you here, traveler? I have been waiting for you. I have heard much about you through Mr. Moneybags. I have a test for you that will prove your worth. I want you to gather up 5 types of maple pieces by hunting monsters around town. Are you up for it?
#rPiece of Courage#k is dropped by #bWild Boars, Dark Axe Stumps, and Axe Stumps#k that can be found around Perion.
#rPiece of Wisdom#k is dropped by #bOrange Mushrooms, Pigs, and Ribbon Pigs#k that can be found around Henesys.
#rPiece of Accuracy#k is dropped by #bOctopus', Blue Mushrooms, and Bubblings#k that can be found around Kerning City.
#rPiece of Freedom#k is dropped by #bEvil Eyes, Curse Eyes, and Jr. Neckis#k that can be found around Sleepywood Dungeon.
I wish you the best of luck.
#rPiece of Dexterity#k is dropped by #bGreen Mushrooms, Slimes, and Lupins#k that can be found around Ellinia.
I will be here watching you work. Remember, you do not have much time. I advise you to take care of this quickly.
Are you not ready yet? If you want to prove your worth to me, then you should taken on this mission. Trust your abilities.
Have you completed your mission?

I knew you wouldn't disappoint. The reason I have asked you to gather these up is not only to test your abilities, but because these pieces are required to create something special. Now wait as I make the pendant for the "Mind of Maple."
Now that I know you can pull your weight, here it is; an item of approval from me.
Not done yet? Keep trying.
Piece of Courage is dropped by Wild Boars, Dark Axe Stumps, and Axe Stumps that can be found around Perion.
Piece of Wisdom is dropped by Orange Mushrooms, Pigs, and Ribbon Pigs that can be found around Henesys.
Piece of Accuracy is dropped by Octopus', Blue Mushrooms, and Bubblings that can be found around Kerning City.
Piece of Dexterity is dropped by Green Mushrooms, Slimes, and Lupins that can be found around Ellinia.
Piece of Freedom is dropped by Evil Eyes, Curse Eyes, and Jr. Neckis that can be found around Sleepywood Dungeon.
